page.title: 19CHILDREN'S CHOICES
page.content: In a survey of 57 children aged 9-11 the following facts were found. 1. Where they lived- East Bilney 2 Gressenhall 28, Beetley 26, N.Elmham 1 2. How they come to school- Car 25, Walk 16, Bicycle 9, Minibus/Taxicab 7 3. Type of hobby prefered- Sport 41, Art/Craft 8, Reading 2, Music 6 4. Food preferences- Salad 14, Roast 16, Fried 22, Sandwiches 5 5. Favourite drinks- Fizzy 42, Milk 6, Tea/Coffee 5, Fruit Juice 3, Squash 1 6. Favourite Sports- 1st Football, 2nd Swimming, 3rd Netball 7. Favourite Lessons- 1st Games/P.E. 2nd Swimming, 3rd Mathematics 8. Favourite T.V. Programmes- 1st Eastenders, 2nd Dempsey and Makepeace, 'A'Team, 3rd Grange Hill 9. Favourite Pop Stars- 1st Madonna, 2nd Wham, 3rd Nik Kershaw
